metadata.title: CVE-2021-26259 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in htmldoc in v1.9.12. Heap buffer overflow inrender_table_row(),in ps-pdf.cxx may lead to arbitrary code execution anddenial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-26259` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

htmldoc - 1.9.11-4
htmldoc-common - 1.9.11-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: htmldoc package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.11-4').
